channel.title: DJLR Name Change And Other Updates
channel.description:
Hey guys. I know I’ve left Auxy but I just thought I should let all you guys know that my name is now Rocca and my youtube is Rocca Music.
I’m excited to see where we can go now.
I’m still always up for feedback/criticism requests as it is still my passion to help you guys. So dont feel as if I’ve forgotten about you guys. I havnt “left” Auxy necessarily. Im More shifting the way I produce with other DAWS. However I do not use Auxy as a first hand production tooo and I will not post any songs coming from Auxy.
So feel free to still keep in touch. I’d love to see what you guys have been making.

Coz I was 12 and silly
